description: Test prompts for Table generation at different complexity levels

simple: Create a basic table showing the main data points
Generate a simple data table from the sources
Display the key information in table format
standard: Generate a well-structured table with relevant columns and calculated fields
Create a comprehensive data table with proper formatting and summary rows
Develop a table showing relationships between data points with totals
detailed: Generate a detailed table with multiple dimensions, calculated columns, and statistical summaries
Create an analytical table with aggregations, groupings, and derived metrics
Produce a sophisticated table with joins, calculations, and comprehensive data presentation
comprehensive: Generate a complete data table with multi-level aggregations, complex calculations, and analytical insights
Create a fully detailed table with SQL-style joins, advanced calculations, and complete documentation of transformations
Develop an exhaustive table showing all data relationships, calculated fields, and comprehensive analysis
